name: NSStepperCell
desc: An NSStepperCell object controls the appearance and behavior of an NSStepper object.

items.name: var maxValue: Double
items.desc: The maximum value for the receiver.

items.name: var minValue: Double
items.desc: The minimum value for the receiver.

items.name: var increment: Double
items.desc: The amount by which the receiver will change per increment or decrement.

items.name: var autorepeat: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating how the receiver responds to mouse events.

items.name: var valueWraps: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value indicating whether the receiver wraps around the minimum and maximum values.
